episodes.title: Chapter 40
episodes.plot: Claire's absence causes problems for Frank on the campaign trail amid rumors of a marital rift. Claire tries to strike out on her own.

episodes.title: Chapter 41
episodes.plot: As Claire begins exploring a campaign of her own, she and Frank engage in backdoor political maneuvering. But this time they're not on the same side.

episodes.title: Chapter 42
episodes.plot: Claire joins Frank as he campaigns in South Carolina, but he doesn't trust her. A disastrous scandal blindsides Frank on primary day.

episodes.title: Chapter 43
episodes.plot: Claire threatens Frank while Frank makes a politically bold move that may provoke Russia.

episodes.title: Chapter 44
episodes.plot: Claire advises the VP Donald Blythe on dealing with Russia. Further investigation of Lucas Goodwin dredges up his accusations against Frank.

episodes.title: Chapter 45
episodes.plot: Claire clashes with the Secretary of State Durant over her involvement in negotiations with Russia. Dunbar must choose between her campaign and her ethics.

episodes.title: Chapter 46
episodes.plot: Frank and Claire adjust to their new reality. The search for Frank's running mate begins. Frank starts a campaign to weaken Conway's strong support.

episodes.title: Chapter 47
episodes.plot: Formidable as ever, Frank and Claire have their eyes on the big picture as they manipulate a potential running mate and push a gun bill.

episodes.title: Chapter 48
episodes.plot: At the convention, Frank and his team publicly push for Secretary of State Durant to be chosen as his running mate, but privately push a different agenda.

episodes.title: Chapter 49
episodes.plot: As Frank deals with a new threat to his candidacy, Claire has doubts about their plan. Claire faces a difficult decision concerning her mother's health.

episodes.title: Chapter 50
episodes.plot: Frank ups the ante on the war on terror to counter Conway's public criticism of his lack of action. Tom joins Claire on the campaign trail.

episodes.title: Chapter 51
episodes.plot: Frank asks Conway to help deal with extremists threatening to murder hostages. Tom Hammerschmidt digs deeper into the allegations against Frank.

episodes.title: Chapter 52
episodes.plot: As the hostage situation continues, Claire secretly negotiates with an extremist leader. Frank confronts Hammerschmidt.
